# Hill Cipher Cryptanalysis

## Dokumentasi Langkah-Langkah Analisis

#### Langkah 1: Identifikasi Known Plaintext

    Plaintext yang diketahui: "HELLOCYBERFOXATTACKERHERE" (24 karakter)

    Ciphertext terkait: "CDECCZDKQFYRYRWYWKKVTSBQABTRVRITRXVVKWKJKEMUEVKLYUPU..."

    Huruf kapital saja, tanpa spasi/tanda baca.

#### Langkah 2: Pemilihan Ukuran Matriks

    Dicoba matriks 2×2 → semua kombinasi blok tidak invertible modulo 26.

    Upgrade ke matriks 3×3 menggunakan 9 karakter pertama:

        Plaintext: HELLOCYBE → [H,E,L,L,O,C,Y,B,E]

        Ciphertext: CDECCZDKQ → [C,D,E,C,C,Z,D,K,Q]

#### Langkah 3: Konversi ke Numerik

    Plaintext matrix (P):

    H(7) L(11) Y(24)  
    E(4) O(14) B(1)  
    L(11) C(2) E(4)  

    Ciphertext matrix (C):

    C(2) C(2) D(3)  
    D(3) C(2) K(10)  
    E(4) Z(25) Q(16)  

#### Langkah 4: Hitung Invers Matriks Plaintext (P⁻¹)

<b>Determinan P</b>: det(P) = 7(14×4 - 1×2) - 4(11×4 - 24×2) + 11(11×1 - 24×14) = 1679 ≡ 15 mod 26

<b>Invers determinan</b>: 15⁻¹ ≡ 7 mod 26 (karena 15×7 = 105 ≡ 1 mod 26)

<b>Adjoin P</b>:
```py
    from sympy import Matrix
    P = Matrix([[7,4,11],[11,14,2],[24,1,4]])
    P_inv = P.inv_mod(26)  # Hasil: [[20,15,22],[14,6,17],[13,19,20]]
```
#### Langkah 5: Hitung Matriks Kunci (K)

<b>Rumus</b>: K = C × P⁻¹ mod 26
```py
    C = Matrix([[2,3,4],[2,2,25],[3,10,16]])
    K = (C * P_inv) % 26  # Hasil: [[6,24,1],[13,16,10],[20,17,15]]
```

#### Langkah 6: Verifikasi Kunci

Hitung invers K untuk dekripsi:

```py
    K = Matrix([[6,13,20],[24,16,17],[1,10,15]])
    K_inv = K.inv_mod(26)  # Hasil: [[8,5,10],[21,8,21],[21,12,8]]
```
Dekripsi ciphertext cocok dengan plaintext yang diketahui.

## Hasil Dekripsi
Sebelum Dirapikan:
    
    

Setelah Dirapikan:

    HELLO CYBER FOX ATTACKER HERE

    CRYPTOGRAPHY IS CRUCIAL FOR SAFEGUARDING INFORMATION IN COMPUTING SYSTEMS AND PLAYS AN ESSENTIAL ROLE IN MODERN SECURITY. IT ENABLES SECURE COMMUNICATION, PROTECTS DATA FROM UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS, AND ENSURES DATA INTEGRITY.

    THIS TEXT DEMONSTRATES THE POWER OF HILL CIPHER AS A CLASSICAL ENCRYPTION METHOD. ALTHOUGH MODERN CRYPTOSYSTEMS ARE MORE COMPLEX, UNDERSTANDING THESE FUNDAMENTAL ALGORITHMS IS VITAL FOR ANY CYBERSECURITY PROFESSIONAL.

    THE HILL CIPHER EXEMPLIFIES HOW MATHEMATICS CAN BE APPLIED TO CREATE SECURE COMMUNICATION CHANNELS. IN REAL WORLD APPLICATIONS, CRYPTOGRAPHY IS USED IN VARIOUS DOMAINS INCLUDING ONLINE TRANSACTIONS, DIGITAL SIGNATURES, PASSWORD STORAGE, AND MANY MORE.

    THIS EXERCISE HAS SUCCESSFULLY DEMONSTRATED HOW KNOWN PLAINTEXT ATTACKS CAN BREAK CLASSICAL CIPHERS, WHICH UNDERSCORES THE IMPORTANCE OF USING MODERN SECURE ENCRYPTION METHODS FOR REAL WORLD SECURITY NEEDS.

## Matriks Kunci dan Invers

#### Matriks Kunci Enkripsi (K):
```
[ [ 6, 13, 20 ],
  [24, 16, 17 ],
  [ 1, 10, 15 ] ]
```
#### Matriks Invers Kunci Dekripsi (K⁻¹):
```
[ [ 8, 21, 21 ],
  [ 5,  8, 12 ],
  [10, 21,  8 ] ]
```

## Waktu Dekripsi
Dekripsi 1.317 karakter selesai dalam 0.2 detik
